programme.title: Lame duck President Reagan, 1988
programme.short_synopsis: What power does the outgoing President Reagan really hold?
programme.medium_synopsis: Considered a lame duck since his farewell State of the Union address in January 1988, Cooke muses on the real power of outgoing President Reagan.
programme.long_synopsis: Considered a lame duck since his farewell State of the Union address in January 1988, Cooke muses on the real power of outgoing President Reagan.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
